data.title: Shaheed Udham Singh Nation Remembers On His Birthday Anniversary December 26 2023
data.meta_description: View Shaheed Udham Singh Nation Remembers On His Birthday Anniversary December 26 2023. This Ad is from collection of Newspaper Sample Ads at Advert Gallery.
data.text:
Shaheed Udham Singh Nation Remembers On His Birthday Anniversary December 26th 2023

Government of Haryana

Nation Remembers

Shaheed Udham Singh

on his Birth Anniversary

December 26, 2023

“शहीद उधमसिंह की बहादुरी हर देशवासी ने अपनी स्मृति में अभी भी सजों रखी है। मैं देश के इस बहादुर सपूत को नमन करता हूं।”

– नरेन्द्र मोदी

Information, Public Relations, Languages and Culture Department, Haryana @ www.prharyana.gov.in |
